I really had a great experience in attending Ryna Sensei‚Äôs singing lessons. I had voice training from different mentors. So far she is one of my best mentors. I had been learning from her for more than 5 years for J pops songs to ensure the pronunciation is up to Japanese standard. I was one of the finalists in JAS NHK karaoke competition and performed 2 songs on her Angel live k on event with proper musician. Thanks to her I passed the audition. She always encourages her students to sing their favorite Japanese songs. She encouraged us to use our natural voice to sing the covers instead of copying the original singers. Until now I‚Äôm still her loyal students.

Teacher Ryna is always fun in class and teaches you many ways in singing, it‚Äôs so amazing how your voice improves and you start to enjoy and love your own unique voice ‚ù§Ô∏è Super recommend, you can always start with any reason, you love singing? 100% go for it!‚ù§Ô∏è

Ms. Lina's voice training was a great experience for me.
The teacher's lessons are tailored to the student's needs, so you can enjoy every lesson.
I was able to deeply learn the joy of expressing myself vocally, and I came to love my own voice. This school is recommended for those interested in voice.
